Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I don't remember how many battles I have gone through, how many Corrupted I defeated.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I didn't see Roland though. That was probably quite lucky of me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Finally, I reached the bottom of the ruins.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Can you believe this? Beneath the ruins so deep underground, is another big and spacious... space!', 4: '1'}
